location.browserCannotProvide: Your browser cannot provide your location.
location.originError: Your browser can only provide your location when using https. You may be able to use {{secureUrl}} instead.
location.centreMap: Centre map at your current location

splitterTool.toggleSplitterTool: Enable side-by-side comparison between two different sets of data
splitterTool.title: Drag left or right to adjust views

compass.description:
Drag outer ring: rotate view.
Drag inner gyroscope: free orbit.
Double-click: reset view.
TIP: You can also free orbit by holding the CTRL key and dragging the map.
compass.title: Click and drag to rotate the camera

share.browserPrint: For better printed results, please use {{appName}}'s Print button instead of your web browser's print feature.
share.shortLinkError: An error occurred while attempting to shorten the URL.  Please check your internet connection and try again.
share.localDataNote: <0><3>Note:</3></0><1>The following data sources will NOT be shared because they include data from this local system. To share these data sources, publish their data on a web server and <2>add them using a url</2>.</1>

share.embedTitle: To embed, copy this code to embed this map into an HTML page:

welcomeMessage.title: Spatial data made <1>easy.</1>
welcomeMessage.WelcomeMessage: Access rich spatial data from multiple data sources, all from one convenient location.

story.message: <2>This is your story editor</2><1>Create and share interactive stories directly from your map<1><0><0></0>Getting Started </0></1></1>
story.promptHtml1: <0>You can view and create stories at any time by clicking here.</0>
story.promptHtml2: <0><0>INTRODUCING</0><1>Data Stories</1><2>Create and share interactive stories directly from your map.</2></0>

guidance.satelliteGuidance: You can access map guides at any time by looking in the <0>help menu</0>.

addData.webFile: <0>Step 2:</0> Enter the URL of the data file or web service

preview.doesNotContainGeospatialData: This file does not contain geospatial data.

viewModels.searchNoLocations: Sorry, no locations match your search query.
viewModels.searchErrorOccurred: An error occurred while searching.  Please check your internet connection or try again later.
viewModels.searchNoPlaceNames: Sorry, no official place names match your search query
viewModels.searchNoCatalogueItem: Sorry, no catalogue items match your search query.

terriaViewer.slowWebGLAvailableMessage: Your web browser reports that it has performance issues displaying {{appName}} in 3D, so you will see a limited, 2D-only experience. For the full 3D experience, please try using a different web browser, upgrading your video drivers, or upgrading your operating system.

dataUri.errorTitle: Browser Does Not Support Data Download
dataUri.errorMessage: Unfortunately Microsoft browsers (including all versions of Internet Explorer and Edge) do not support the data uri functionality needed to download data as a file. To download, copy the following uri into another browser such as Chrome, Firefox or Safari: {{href}}

findIndex.nullUndefined: findIndex called on null or undefined
findIndex.function: findIndex predicate must be a function

printWindow.errorMessage: Printing did not start within 10 seconds. Maybe this web browser does not support printing?

googleAnalytics.log: Google Analytics tracking is disabled because terria.configParameters.googleAnalyticsKey is not specified

readXml.xmlError: The file does not contain valid XML.

serverConfig.failedToGet: Failed to get server config from {{serverConfigUrl}}. This means services such as proxy, convert and URL shortening may not work.

addressGeocoder.devError: bulkConvertAddresses must be implemented in the derived class.

cesium.failedToObtain: Failed to obtain image tile X: {{x}} Y: {{y}} Level: {{level}}.
cesium.notWebMercatorTilingScheme: This dataset cannot be displayed on the 2D map because it does not support the Web Mercator (EPSG:3857) projection.
cesium.unusalTilingScheme: This dataset cannot be displayed on the 2D map because it uses an unusual tiling scheme that is not supported.

gmlToGeoJson.missingPos: GML point element is missing a pos element.
gmlToGeoJson.missingExteriorRing: GML polygon is missing its exterior ring.

mapboxVectorTileImageryProvider.requireStyles: MapboxVectorTileImageryProvider requires a styling function passed as options.styleFunc
mapboxVectorTileImageryProvider.moreThanFourTiles: The imagery provider's rectangle and minimumLevel indicate that there are {{tileCount}} tiles at the minimum level. Imagery providers with more than four tiles at the minimum level are not supported.
mapboxVectorTileImageryProvider.maxLevelError: Maximum level too high for data set

csv.name: Comma-Separated Values (CSV)
csv.dataSourceErrorMessage: This data source does not have any details available.
csv.serviceErrorMessage: This service does not have any details available.
csv.unexpectedTypeMessage: CsvCatalogItem data is expected to be a Blob, File, or String, but it was not any of these. This may indicate a bug in terriajs or incorrect use of the terriajs API. If you believe it is a bug in {{appName}} please report it by emailing
csv.unableToLoadMessage: See the csv-geo-au specification for supported CSV formats. {{message}}
csv.unableToLoadItemTitle: Unable to load CSV Catalog Item
csv.unableToLoadItemMessage: CSV did not have data or url to load from.

csw.name: Catalogue Service (CSW)
csw.unknownError: The CSW server reported an unknown error.
csw.exceptionMessage:
The CSW server reported an error:

 {{exceptionText}}
csw.notUseableMessage:
Invalid response obtained when invoking GetDomain on the CSW server.

This error may indicate that the catalogue server you specified is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try opening the processing server again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to
csw.checkCORSDomain:
Couldn't execute GetDomain on this CSW server.

If you entered the URL manually, please double-check it.

If it's your server, make sure CORS is enabled.

Otherwise, if reloading doesn't fix it, please report the problem by sending an email to {{email}} with the technical details below. Thank you!
csw.checkCORSRecords:
Couldn't execute GetRecords on this CSW server.

If it's your server, make sure CORS is enabled.

Otherwise, if reloading doesn't fix it, please report the problem by sending an email to {{email}} with the technical details below. Thank you!

geoJson.errorParsingMessage: sr2An error occurred parsing the provided data as JSON.  This may indicate that the file is invalid or that it is not supported by {{appName}}. If you would like assistance or further information, please email us at {{email}}
geoJson.errorLoadingMessage: sr1An error occurred while loading a GeoJSON file.  This may indicate that the file is invalid or that it is not supported by {{appName}}. If you would like assistance or further information, please email us at {{email}}

raiseError.errorMessage: {{appName}}  experienced an error.  Please report this by emailing {{email}}. Details of the error are below.

regionMapping.noDataForDate: No data for the selected date.
regionMapping.noDataForRegion: No data for the selected region.
regionMapping.outdatedBrowserMessage: You are using a very old web browser that cannot display "region mapped" datasets such as this one.  Please upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Microsoft Internet Explorer 11, or Apple Safari as soon as possible.  Please contact us at {{email}} if you have any concerns.
regionMapping.invalidServerTypeMessage: Expected serverType to be "WMS" or "vector" but got "{{serverType}}"

feedback.unableToSendMessage: This is really embarrassing, but an error occurred while attempting to send your feedback.  Please email it to {{email}} instead.

sensorObservationService.alreadyLoadingMessage: Your data is still loading. You will be able to change the display once it has loaded
sensorObservationService.unknownError: The server reported an unknown error.
sensorObservationService.missingBody: The server responded with missing body.
sensorObservationService.noFeatures: There are no features matching your query.
sensorObservationService.unknownFormat: The server responded with an unknown feature format.
sensorObservationService.noMatchingFeatures: The Sensor Observation Service did not return any features matching your query.

time.invalidInitialTimeSource: Invalid initialTimeSource specified in config file: {{initialTimeSource}}

shareData.generateErrorMessage: Something went wrong when trying to use the share data service to generate a short URL. If you believe it is a bug in {{appName}}, please report it by emailing {{email}}.
shareData.expandErrorMessage: The share data service used to launch {{appName}} was not located. This may indicate an error in the link or that the service is unavailable at this time. If you believe it is a bug in {{appName}}, please report it by emailing {{email}}

terria.initErrorMessage: A problem occurred with the Terria server. This may cause some layers or the conversion service to be unavailable.
terria.urlLoadErrorMessage: A problem occurred while initialising Terria with URL parameters.

terriaJSONcatalog.name: Terria JSON Catalog Function
terriaJSONcatalog.misconfiguredErrorMessage: Service not configured for TerriaJsonCatalogFunction HTTP 202.
terriaJSONcatalog.misconfiguredError2Message: HTTP 202 configuration {{url}} not present in response {{xhr}}
terriaJSONcatalog.serviceResponseErrorMessage: TerriaJsonCatalogFunction was supposed to receive a JSON string, received {{xhr}}
terriaJSONcatalog.asyncResultDescription: This is the result of invoking the {{name}} process or service at {{timestamp}} with the input parameters below.
terriaJSONcatalog.loadingInitSourceErrorMessage: Error loading initialization source {{fragment}} because no initFragmentPaths are defined.
terriaJSONcatalog.loadingInitSourceError2Message: An error occurred while loading initialization information from {{loadSource}}. This may indicate that you followed an invalid link or that there is a problem with your Internet connection.

webFeatureServiceCatalogGroup.invalidWFSServerMessage:
An error occurred while invoking GetCapabilities on the WFS server. The server's response does not appear to be a valid GetCapabilities document.

If you entered the link manually, please verify that the link is correct.

If you did not enter this link manually, this error may indicate that the group you opened is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try opening the group again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.
webFeatureServiceCatalogGroup.groupNotAvailableMessage:
An error occurred while invoking GetCapabilities on the WFS server.

If you entered the link manually, please verify that the link is correct.

This error may also indicate that the server does not support CORS. If this is your server, verify that CORS is enabled and enable it if it is not. If you do not control the server, please contact the administrator of the server and ask them to enable CORS. Or, contact the '{{appName}}' Map team by emailing {{email}} and ask us to add this server to the list of non-CORS-supporting servers that may be proxied by '{{appName}}' itself.

If you did not enter this link manually, this error may indicate that the group you opened is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try opening the group again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.

webMapServiceCatalogGroup.invalidWMSServerMessage:
An error occurred while invoking GetCapabilities on the WMS server. The server's response does not appear to be a valid GetCapabilities document.

If you entered the link manually, please verify that the link is correct.

If you did not enter this link manually, this error may indicate that the group you opened is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try opening the group again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.
webMapServiceCatalogGroup.groupNotAvailableMessage:
An error occurred while invoking GetCapabilities on the WMS server.

webMapServiceCatalogItem.noLayerFoundMessage: The WMS dataset '{{name}}' has no layers matching '{{layers}}'. {{suggested}} {{line}}{{line}}Either the catalog file has been set up incorrectly, or the WMS server has changed.{{line}}{{line}}Please report this error by sending an email to {{email}}.
webMapServiceCatalogItem.datasetScaleErrorTitle: Dataset will not be shown at this scale
webMapServiceCatalogItem.datasetScaleErrorMessage: The {{name}} dataset will not be shown when zoomed in this close to the map because the data custodian has indicated that the data is not intended or suitable for display at this scale.  Click the dataset's Info button on the Now Viewing tab for more information about the dataset and the data custodian.
webMapServiceCatalogItem.badlyFormatedMessage: The '{{name}}' dataset has a badly formed periodicity, '{{isoSegments}}'. Click the dataset's Info button for more information about the dataset and the data custodian.
webMapServiceCatalogItem.missingDataMessage: The WMS dataset '{{name}}' did not return any data.{{line}}{{line}}Either the catalog file has been set up incorrectly, or the server address has changed.{{line}}{{line}}Please report this error by emailing {{email}}.

webProcessingService.invalidWPSServerMessage:
An error occurred while invoking DescribeProcess on the WPS server for process name {{name}}. The server's response does not appear to be a valid DescribeProcess document.

This error may also indicate that the processing server you specified is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try opening the processing server again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.
webProcessingService.processDescriptionErrorTitle: Process does not have a process description
webProcessingService.processDescriptionErrorMessage: The WPS DescribeProcess for this process does not include a ProcessDescription.
webProcessingService.processInputErrorTitle: Process does not have any inputs
webProcessingService.processInputErrorMessage: This WPS process does not specify any inputs.
webProcessingService.unsupportedParameterErrorMessage: The parameter {{identifier}} is not a supported type of parameter.
webProcessingService.invalidResponseErrorMessage:
An error occurred while accessing the status location on the WPS server for process name {{name}}. The server's response does not appear to be a valid ExecuteResponse document.

This error may also indicate that the processing server you specified is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. If the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.
webProcessingService.invalidResponseError2Message: The response from the WPS server does not include a Status element.
webProcessingService.failureReasonUnknowError: The reason for failure is unknown.
webProcessingService.asyncShortReportFailed: Web Processing Service invocation failed.  More details are available on the Info panel.
